title: [Seminar Series on Artificial General Intelligence (AGI) ＃1] Dr. Jim Fan (Research Scientist, NVIDIA AI)
content: title:[Seminar Series on Artificial General Intelligence (AGI) ＃1] Dr. Jim Fan (Research Scientist, NVIDIA AI) date:2023-11-17T00:00:00Z link:https://cs.kaist.ac.kr/board/view?bbs_id=events&bbs_sn=10925&page=1&skey=&svalue=&menu=86 content:We cordially invite you to the <Seminar Series on Artificial General Intelligence> organized by Machine Learning and Mind Lab (MLML) at School of Computing. The first speaker is Dr. Linxi "Jim" Fan who is leading the research of general-purpose autonomous agent research at NVIDIA. • Date & Time: 2023.11.17.(Tue) 1:30 pm • Venue: (online) https://kaist.zoom.us/j/9385720297?pwd=ZEFlRjFnSis0cUtRRFQ3ZmRyazAxdz09 • Speakers: Dr. Jim Fan (Research Scientist, NVIDIA AI) • Topic: Research on General-purpose Autonomous Agents at NVIDIA AI • Contact: Prof. Sungjin Ahn (School of Computing) sungjin.ahn＠kaist.ac.kr ＊ This seminar will be held in English. location: online(zoom) tag:csweb.calendar
